channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: Functional Programming with Strava Data
item.description: Strava (http://labs.strava.com) is a data rich platform to collect, store, and use physical activity data. One key challenge faced by many sporting enthusiasts is how to effectively take control of their own data to make novel and interesting visualizations or depictions of one’s hard work. In some senses, Strava makes this easy by packing your data for you with options on how you wish to view your achievements. For the DIY’er, the story is a little more complicated.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
